title: Elizabeth Line would ‘never’ be built, Portillo wrote when urging cancellation
description: Former Treasury minister warned that Crossrail London link was too costly and unnecessary, newly released papers show
content: Former Treasury minister warned that Crossrail London link was too costly and unnecessary, newly released papers show
